original: @225b # // rgya gar skad du /

original: dang por bdag med pa la mos pa dang / lkog ma sbyang ba dang / lag pa sbyang ba dang / bgegs bsgrang ba dang / gnas bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang / me tog la sogs pas mchod pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang /
analyzed: dang por bdag med pa la mos pa dang / lkog ma sbyang ba dang / lag pa sbyang ba dang / bgegs bsgrang ba dang / gnas bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang / me tog la sogs pas mchod pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang /
translated: First, visualizing oneself as NairƒÅtmya, purifying the throat, purifying the hands, counting the obstacles, protecting the place, emanating the ma·πá·∏çala, offering with flowers and so forth, paying homage,

original: sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / bskul ba dang / mchod pa nyi shu dang / bdag nyid dbul ba dang / bsngo ba dang / smon lam gdab pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / bskul ba dang / mchod pa nyi shu dang / bdag nyid dbul ba dang / bsngo ba dang / smon lam gdab pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
translated: confessing misdeeds, rejoicing in merit, supplicating, exhorting, the twenty offerings, offering oneself, dedication, making aspirations, and generating bodhicitta.

original: sdom pa nyi shu blang ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa phul du byung ba dang / rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyis gzugs brnyan bsgom pa dang / phyag rgya bcing ba sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa mdor bstan pa dang /
analyzed: sdom pa nyi shu blang ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa phul du byung ba dang / rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyis gzugs brnyan bsgom pa dang / phyag rgya bcing ba sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bsgrub pa mdor bstan pa dang /
translated: the twenty vows, the excellent generation of the mind of enlightenment, the natural ma·πá·∏çala, the emanation ma·πá·∏çala, the meditation on the ma·πá·∏çala, the concise explanation of the practice of the rite that precedes the binding of the mudra,

original: rdo rje thal mo'i mtshan nyid dang de dag byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang / rdo rje dbab pa bskyed pa dang / rdo rje brtan par bya ba dang / ngan song thams cad dgug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dral ba dang / phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo'i mtshan nyid dang de dag byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang / rdo rje dbab pa bskyed pa dang / rdo rje brtan par bya ba dang / ngan song thams cad dgug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dral ba dang / phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
translated: the characteristics of the vajra-folded palms, the mantra for blessing those, the generation of the vajra descent, the stabilization of the vajra, summoning all evil destinies, the unravelling of all evil, and the releasing of the mudra,

original: de nyid phul du dbyung ba dang / rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la snying po dgod pa dang / zla ba gnyis bsgom pa dang / rdo rje bsgom pa dang / gzhan bsgrub pa la phyag rgya gzhan bsgom pa dang / snying po dgod pa dang /üîΩphyag rgya'i nga rgyal dang sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa dang / dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de'i nga rgyal dang / de nyid kyis gzhan bzhir byin gyis brlab pa dang /
analyzed: de nyid phul du dbyung ba dang / rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la snying po dgod pa dang / zla ba gnyis bsgom pa dang / rdo rje bsgom pa dang / gzhan bsgrub pa la phyag rgya gzhan bsgom pa dang / snying po dgod pa dang / phyag rgya'i nga rgyal dang sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa dang / dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de'i nga rgyal dang / de nyid kyis gzhan bzhir byin gyis brlab pa dang /
translated: The first is the supreme state of the pledge seal, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra.üîΩThe first is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra and the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra, the deity and the deity and the mantra.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i snying po dang / sngags bzlas pa dang / rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor bsams pa dang / phreng ba blangs te dor ba dang / @226a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i snying po dang / sngags bzlas pa dang / rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor bsams pa dang / phreng ba blangs te dor ba dang / @226a * //
translated: The first is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra and the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra, the deity and the deity and the mantra.üîΩThe first is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra and the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra, the deity and the deity and the mantra.üîΩThe first is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra and the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra, the deity and the deity and the mantra.üîΩThe first is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra and the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra, the deity and the deity and the mantra.üîΩThe first is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the second is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity and the mantra, the third is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity, the mantra and the deity and the fourth is the supreme state of the pledge seal of the deity,

original: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / phreng ba blang ste spyi bor bkrol cing bcing ba dang / gdong g-yogs dgrol ba dang / dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / mthong ba de brtan par bya ba dang / dbang bskur lnga dang / dkyil 'khor re re zhing dag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / phreng ba blang ste spyi bor bkrol cing bcing ba dang / gdong g-yogs dgrol ba dang / dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / mthong ba de brtan par bya ba dang / dbang bskur lnga dang / dkyil 'khor re re zhing dag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
translated: stabilizing that seeing,üîΩthe five empowerments,üîΩthe consecration of the purity of each mandala,üîΩand the yoga of accomplishing the 592 minor deities in the self-consecration of each mandala,üîΩthe single mandala at the heart,

original: dkyil 'khor re re'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sos pa lnga brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor sgrub pa dang / snying ga'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pa dang / rang gi lus la zla ba mang po dgod pa dang / de nas nam mkha' la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa dang /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor re re'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sos pa lnga brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor sgrub pa dang / snying ga'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pa dang / rang gi lus la zla ba mang po dgod pa dang / de nas nam mkha' la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa dang /
translated: arraying many moons in one‚Äôs body,üîΩand then arraying the moon ma·πá·∏çalas in the sky,

original: snying po dgod pa dang / rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dgod pa dang / de'i nga rgyal dang / dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / blta ba dang / dgug pa la sogs pas rang gi lus la gzhug pa dang /
analyzed: snying po dgod pa dang / rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dgod pa dang / de'i nga rgyal dang / dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / blta ba dang / dgug pa la sogs pas rang gi lus la gzhug pa dang /
translated: the placement of the essence, the placement of the hand implements such as the vajra, the pride of that, the generation of the ma·πá·∏çala, summoning the gnosis beings, the view, and the entry of the gnosis beings into one‚Äôs body through the summoning and so on,

original: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / snying po dang sngags dag gis brtan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang / rdo rje dbyings sngon du 'gro ba'i rigs lnga'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / snying po dang sngags dag gis brtan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang / rdo rje dbyings sngon du 'gro ba'i rigs lnga'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
translated: the divisions of color, shape, and so on, stabilizing with the essence mantras, the entry of all tathƒÅgatas, and the consecration with the mantras of the five families preceded by the vajra realm.

original: gnas bzhi por rdo rje la sogs pa dgod pa dang / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad spyi'i sngags kyis bcing ba dang yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ba dang / yang dbang bskur blang ba dang / dga' ba'i glu dang gar dang l'a sye la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
analyzed: gnas bzhi por rdo rje la sogs pa dgod pa dang / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad spyi'i sngags kyis bcing ba dang yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ba dang / yang dbang bskur blang ba dang / dga' ba'i glu dang gar dang l'a sye la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
translated: The four places are marked with the vajra and so forth, sealed with the four seals, bound with the mantra of all seals, stabilized with the hundred syllables, the empowerment is conferred again, and one takes it.

original: rdo rje dril bu blang ba'i de kho na nyid dang sngags brjod pas de dag brtan par bya ba dang / tshig gsum gyi glu blang ba dang / rang bzhin med pa'i sngags kyis bdag med par bsgom pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu blang ba'i de kho na nyid dang sngags brjod pas de dag brtan par bya ba dang / tshig gsum gyi glu blang ba dang / rang bzhin med pa'i sngags kyis bdag med par bsgom pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: There is the offering of the song and dance of joy, laypeople, and so forth, the reality of taking up the vajra and bell, and stabilizing them with the recitation of the mantra, singing the song of the three phrases, meditating on selflessness with the mantra of nonexistence, and the pure vessel world.

original: spyi'i gdan dang / khyad par gyi gdan dang / don thams cad grub pas bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa bsgom pa dang / mi g-yo ba la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bzhengs pa dang / de rnams mthong ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang /
analyzed: spyi'i gdan dang / khyad par gyi gdan dang / don thams cad grub pas bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa bsgom pa dang / mi g-yo ba la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bzhengs pa dang / de rnams mthong ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang /
translated: the general seat, the special seat, the meditation on the formless and the meditative absorptions by the accomplishment of all aims, the entry into immovability, the arising of the Tathagata, the seeing of them, the salutation to them,

original: de rnams kyi gdams ngag dang mngon par byang chub pa lnga @226b ni sems so sor rtog pa mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / rdo rje bskyod pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gdams ngag dang mngon par byang chub pa lnga @226b ni sems so sor rtog pa mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / rdo rje bskyod pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: the instruction of them, and the five manifest enlightenments. The mind is the essence of Akshobhya, the discernment of the mind. The generation of the enlightenment mind is the perfection of generosity, Ratnasambhava. The vajra stirring is Amitabha, the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab zhugs pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab zhugs pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The entry of the atoms of the body, etc., of all the Tathagatas is the perfection of effort, Amoghasiddhi.

original: gzugs rdzogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: gzugs rdzogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The perfection of form is the nature of all the Tathagatas,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of Vairocana.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dang rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa dang / ri rab kyi rtse mor gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs su bskor ba ste sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dang rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa dang / ri rab kyi rtse mor gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs su bskor ba ste sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The consecration of the vajra gem, the bestowal of permission, the creation of the celestial mansion on the peak of Mount Meru, and being surrounded by the four Tathagatas - this is the first application, the samadhi.

original: nang gi bdag nyid khrus ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid khrus ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The inner ablution is the application of mindfulness to the body.

original: lkog ma dang lce byin gyis brlab pa ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: lkog ma dang lce byin gyis brlab pa ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The consecration of the throat and tongue is the application of mindfulness to feelings.

original: lag pa byin gyis brlab pa ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa byin gyis brlab pa ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The consecration of the hands is the application of mindfulness to mind.

original: bgegs bskrad pa ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //üîΩbgegs 'joms pa ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: bgegs bskrad pa ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o // bgegs 'joms pa ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: The expulsion of obstacles is the application of mindfulness to dharmas.üîΩThe destruction of obstacles is the basis of psychic power of investigation.

original: bgegs bcings pa ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: bgegs bcings pa ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: The binding of obstacles is the basis of psychic power of analysis.

original: steng bcings pa ni mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa spang ba'o //
analyzed: steng bcings pa ni mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa spang ba'o //
translated: The binding above is the abandonment of arisen non-virtuous dharmas.

original: yang shar la sogs pa bcings pa ni mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa mi skyed pa'o //
analyzed: yang shar la sogs pa bcings pa ni mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa mi skyed pa'o //
translated: Again, the binding of the east, etc., is the non-generation of non-virtuous dharmas that have not arisen.

original: dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang dkyil 'khor lngas phyag btsal ba ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang dkyil 'khor lngas phyag btsal ba ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa bskyed pa'o //
translated: The emanation of the mandala and the homage with the five mandalas is the generation of virtuous dharmas that have not arisen.

original: sdig pa bshags pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa nas brtsams te /
translated: From the confession of sins up to

original: mchod pa nyi shu dang sdom pa blang ba ni dge ba'i chos skyes pa bsrung ba tshogs kyi lam mo //üîΩde nas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: mchod pa nyi shu dang sdom pa blang ba ni dge ba'i chos skyes pa bsrung ba tshogs kyi lam mo // de nas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nas brtsams te /
translated: the twenty offerings and the taking of vows is the protection of arisen virtuous dharmas. This is the path of accumulation.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i bar du sbyor ba'i lam yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i bar du sbyor ba'i lam yin te /
translated: Then, from the yoga of the image, etc., up to the great yoga is the path of preparation.

original: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa dang / rdo rje dbab pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / sdig pa dral ba dang / ngan 'gro sbyong ba ni dad pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa dang / rdo rje dbab pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / sdig pa dral ba dang / ngan 'gro sbyong ba ni dad pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The vajra palms, the vajra binding, the vajra descent, the stabilization, the loosening of sins, and the purification of the lower realms are the faculty of faith.

original: bdag med pa bsgom pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa bsgom pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The meditation on selflessness is the faculty of perseverance.

original: zla ba gnyis bskyed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis bskyed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The generation of the two moons is the faculty of mindfulness.

original: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //üîΩsnying @227a * //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o // snying @227a * //
translated: The introduction of the gnosis being, etc. , is the faculty of wisdom.

original: gar dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni dad pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: gar dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni dad pa'i stobs so //
translated: The mandala in the heart is the power of faith.

original: de la 'jug pa ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs so //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs so //
translated: The entry into it is the power of perseverance.

original: phreng ba'i dbang ni dran pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: phreng ba'i dbang ni dran pa'i stobs so //
translated: The empowerment of the garland is the power of mindfulness.

original: dam tshig gsum gyi glu ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum gyi glu ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so //
translated: The song of the three pledges is the power of meditative stabilization.

original: yang stong pa nyid bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi stobs te sbyor ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: yang stong pa nyid bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi stobs te sbyor ba'i lam mo //
translated: Again, the cultivation of emptiness is the power of wisdom, which is the path of preparation.

original: 'og min la yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: 'og min la yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The abiding of the mind-made body in Akani·π£·π≠ha is the branch of enlightenment of meditative stabilization.

original: ri rab la sogs pa bsgom pa ni brtson 'grus la sogs pa byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ri rab la sogs pa bsgom pa ni brtson 'grus la sogs pa byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The cultivation of Meru, etc. , is the branch of enlightenment of perseverance, etc.

original: gdan bsgom pa ni dga' ba byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: gdan bsgom pa ni dga' ba byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The cultivation of the seat is the branch of enlightenment of joy.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs pa ni shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs pa ni shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The arrival of all the Tathagatas is the limb of enlightenment of tranquility.

original: de rnams mthong ba ni chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de rnams mthong ba ni chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: Their vision is the limb of enlightenment of the investigation of phenomena.

original: de rnams kyi gdams ngag ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gdams ngag ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: Their instruction is the limb of enlightenment of mindfulness.

original: de dag bdag ngag gi mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba ni /
analyzed: de dag bdag ngag gi mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba ni /
translated: Their abandonment of the concentration of unshakable speech is

original: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: the limb of enlightenment of equanimity.

original: de ni mthong ba'i lam ste sa dang po'o //
analyzed: de ni mthong ba'i lam ste sa dang po'o //
translated: This is the path of seeing, the first stage.

original: sems so sor rtog pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste sa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: sems so sor rtog pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste sa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The discernment of mind is right view, the second stage.

original: sems bskyed pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ste sa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ste sa gsum pa'o //
translated: The generation of mind is right thought, the third stage.

original: rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom pa ni yang dag pa'i dag ste sa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom pa ni yang dag pa'i dag ste sa bzhi pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the nature of the vajra is right speech, the fourth stage.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ste sa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ste sa lnga pa'o //
translated: The entry of all the Tathagatas is right livelihood, the fifth stage.

original: gzugs grub pa ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ste sa drug pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs grub pa ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ste sa drug pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of form is right effort, the sixth stage.

original: byin gyis brlab pa ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste sa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste sa bdun pa'o //
translated: The consecration is right action, the seventh stage.

original: dbang bskur ba dang dbyangs bcings pa ni yang dag pa'i dran pa ste sa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang dbyangs bcings pa ni yang dag pa'i dran pa ste sa brgyad pa'o //
translated: The empowerment and the binding of the melody are right mindfulness, the eighth stage.

original: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te sa dgu pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te sa dgu pa'o //
translated: The stabilization by the hundred-syllable mantra is right meditative stabilization, the ninth stage.

original: rjes su gnang ba lnga thob pa ni sa bcu pa ste bsgom pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: rjes su gnang ba lnga thob pa ni sa bcu pa ste bsgom pa'i lam mo //
translated: The attainment of the five permissions is the tenth stage, the path of cultivation.

original: de ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: That is the meditative stabilization of the initial application.

original: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro bas rgyu dang 'bras bu nye bar btags pas bshad do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro bas rgyu dang 'bras bu nye bar btags pas bshad do //
translated: The supreme king of ma·πá·∏çalas is explained by the vajra-like meditative stabilization that precedes it, designated as cause and effect.

original: las rgyal po mchog ni sems can gyi las gtso bo yin pas /
analyzed: las rgyal po mchog ni sems can gyi las gtso bo yin pas /
translated: The supreme king of activities is the principal activity of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gcig pa kun du 'od ces bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gcig pa kun du 'od ces bya'o //
translated: The eleventh stage of buddhahood is called Universal Light.

original: @227b lam gyi rim pa'o //
analyzed: @227b lam gyi rim pa'o //
translated: The stages of the path.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bsgom pa'i don bsdus pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bsgom pa'i don bsdus pa rdzogs so /
translated: The meaning of the VajradhƒÅtu ma·πá·∏çala is complete.

original: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku m'a ra ka la sha'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
analyzed: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku m'a ra ka la sha'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
